services.name: Web Development
services.description: Need a website for your service or company? Need help customizing your Wordpress site? Want to build an online store or some other kind of web system? I am experienced Web Developer with knowledge of both front- and backend development, from databases to Rest APIs and frontend web applications. I can help you design and implement a good-looking, responsive and user-friendly web application or website.

services.name: Mobile Applications
services.description: Aside from web applications, I have experience building mobile apps as well. Although native apps are a valid solution, my experience is primarily in hybrid frameworks like Phonegap, Ionic or React Native. I can help turn your idea into an app for both Android and iOS, with an easily approachable UI and smooth functionality.

services.name: UI and UX Design
services.description: Looking for designers for your web or mobile app? I can help you there, with an eye for design and a skill for prototyping and experience with Adobe Xd and Photoshop, I'll make a design that not only looks good, but comes with an understanding of programming for your client-side developers.

services.name: Database Design and Consultation
services.description: Having worked extensively with Big Data, I am here to help you take the data you have coming from multiple sources and in multiple file formats, and turn it into a viable database for your business needs. With scripts and automation services, I can even turn your data flow from a manual process to an automatic one.

services.name: Consulting Services
services.description: Have another software-related issue I can help with? SEO, data visualization, mobile responsiveness, integrations or something else? Contact me and I'll see what we can do together.
